title: Charlie Chalkman's chalk catcher challenge
brief_description: This interactive game is designed for younger children. Set on a chalkboard, the main character Charlie (controlled by the player) tries to catch the falling chalks and fruits to achieve a high score. The player must also avoid the falling erasers, which if touched, rub Charlie out to end the game.
